title: TIMESONLINE
content:
Hi,

Does anybody know the font used for TIMESONLINE. I've tried quite a few things but cant find the exact match.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/times_6149.jpg)

Actually I am trying to find the fonts for quite a few of the major newspapers so any help would be much appreciated.

Guardian and Observer

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/guardian_4646.jpg)

Telegraph

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/telegraph_4001.jpg)
author: mukhtarsanders

comments.content:
Newspaper nameplates are almost always custom.  
In the case of Times and Guardian, there are entire custom typefaces.
Guardian should be Schwartzco [Guardian Egyptian Text Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020201020/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/guardian/egyptian_text/bold).
